Title: Relates to the definition of income for purposes of the senior citizen rent increase exemptions (SCRIE) program
Summary: Excludes social security payments and supplemental security income from the definition of "income" for the purposes of determining eligibility under the senior citizen rent increase exemption (SCRIE).
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to the definition of income for purposes of the senior citizen rent increase exemptions (SCRIE) program
